channel.title: Comments on: So iPad in the UK… not so much

item.title: By: Kerr
item.dc:creator: Kerr
item.description: <p>Looking at the small print the US version explicitly says "iBooks is available only in the U.S.". :(</p>
item.content:encoded: Looking at the small print the US version explicitly says "iBooks is available only in the U.S.". üôÅ

item.title: By: mark myers
item.dc:creator: mark myers
item.description: <p>UK copy write lawyers are a pain in the arse, you just have to look at the difference between http://www.audible.com/ and http://www.audible.co.uk,/ its a shame that it impacts physical products</p>
item.content:encoded: UK copy write lawyers are a pain in the arse, you just have to look at the difference between http://www.audible.com/ and http://www.audible.co.uk/, its a shame that it impacts physical products
